\documentclass{article}

% Load NeurIPS style with desired options
\usepackage[final]{neurips}  % Options: final, confidential, internal, draft

% Standard packages
\usepackage[utf8]{inputenc}
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
\usepackage{hyperref}
\usepackage{url}
\usepackage{booktabs}
\usepackage{amsfonts}
\usepackage{amsmath}
\usepackage{graphicx}

% ============================================================================
% DOCUMENT METADATA (Optional - uncomment and customize as needed)
% ============================================================================

% Organization information
% \setorganization{Your Organization}

% Document classification
% \setdoctype{Technical Report}
% \setdocid{DOC-2025-001}

% Note: Metadata appears in footer at bottom of first page ONLY if set
% Status label (if using confidential/internal/draft) appears at top-left
% If no metadata is set, the footer will be empty

% ============================================================================
% DOCUMENT INFORMATION
% ============================================================================

\title{Document Title}

\author{
  Author Name \\
  Department or Affiliation \\
  Organization \\
  \texttt{email@example.com}
}

% ============================================================================
% DOCUMENT CONTENT
% ============================================================================

\begin{document}

\maketitle

\begin{abstract}
This is the abstract of your document. Provide a concise summary of your work, including the main objectives, methodology, key findings, and conclusions. Keep it brief and informative.
\end{abstract}

\section{Introduction}

This is the introduction section. Provide background information, motivation, and context for your work.

\subsection{Background}

Describe the background and related work relevant to your document.

\subsection{Objectives}

State the main objectives or goals of this work.

\section{Methodology}

Describe your approach, methods, or procedures.

\section{Results}

Present your findings, results, or analysis.

\subsection{Key Findings}

Highlight the most important results.

\section{Discussion}

Discuss the implications and significance of your results.

\section{Conclusion}

Summarize your main points and conclusions.

% Acknowledgments (optional)
\begin{ack}
We would like to thank those who contributed to this work.
\end{ack}

% References (if using bibliography)
% \bibliographystyle{plain}
% \bibliography{references}

\end{document}
